remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  Let ` A ` be the class of "acceptable" functions.  The final thing we're interested in is the union of all these acceptable functions.  This lemma just changes some bound variables in ` A ` for later use.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1995.)
statement:
tfrlem3.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem3 $p |- A = { g | E. z e. On ( g Fn z /\ A. w e. z ( g ` w ) = ( F ` ( g |` w ) ) ) } $.
$d A g $.
$d F f g w x y z $.
